R0087.title: Business Logic Tampering Risk
R0087.definition: The potential threat of attackers modifying the runtime logic of business systems to manipulate or disrupt system functions, steal sensitive information, or carry out other malicious activities.
R0087.description: Scenarios include attackers illegally modifying business logic, manipulating transaction processes, or tampering with data inputs, potentially causing incorrect system processing, resource abuse, or unauthorized data access.
R0087.influence: Harms include business data inconsistency and compromised transaction integrity, potentially causing financial losses, loss of trust, and compliance issues for the organization.
